\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{index}

\makeindex
\newindex[theenumi]{list}{ldx}{lnd}{Items}
 
\begin{document}

Wibble, wibble, foo\index{foo}, foo, bar\index{bar}.
 
\begin{enumerate}
  \item Gronk
  \item Baz\index[list]{baz}
  \item Quux\index[list]{quux}
\end{enumerate}

\printindex[list]
\printindex

\end{document}
